Text:
Great quality, though 2nd movie looks like it's a 'little' tall... first has a small amount of black at the top/bottom, 2nd one is full 16:9. 

Maybe forced? or just me?
I re-encoded the 2nd movie to 1280x688 from 1280x720 to match the 1st movie and everything looks proper again.

You're welcome...
Both movies have original dimensions. I couuld have cropped the second one to match them, but was fine to me as it was.
